review:
This was my second experience with the doctor. First time it was for my mother and this time my visit was pertaining to my aunt's hip injury.

As usual Dr. Sushanth recommended no-fuss approach. I like for his simplicity, spot on treatment ******* ******* **** *********** ***** *** **********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. M V Sushanth is been a good consultant, my hand surgery went quite well. The hospital and staff services are also good. Overall good experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ******** ** * **** **** ******** Operated my mother for hip fracture. Good hospital and staff services .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: so I had an appointment with this Doc. yesterday at 6:15 and I reached his location at the exact time and when reported at the reception counter and they said Doctor will see you in few minutes before that we'll complete the formalities of entering the basic details of the patient and whilst we were on that, receptionist gets a call from the Doctor and the Doctor knows there will be a patient coming at 6:15 so that's why he calls the receptionist and cancels the appointment says he's not coming, I didn't know what to do since I trusted this app and it's prime features or it was the Doctors fault for not calling beforehand and let me know he won't be there at the hospital, because I had to ride the bike myself in Hyderabad traffic with shoulder pain for 8kms, give or take. nothing was worth it. went home with regrets. smh

tags: Wait time,
review:
Booked an appointment for 10am. I got a call from clinic to come between 11-1130am as the doctor will not be available at 10 am. I reached there at 1115. The staff was not ready to tell when the doctor will be available for checkup. I waited for a little more than half an hour and when the doctor still did not come for checkup, I left the clinic. 

Also, the fees for my first visit on 16th August was Rs. 350. For the second visit today (25th August), the receptionist was asking for Rs. 500.. I am not sure if this is the norm at this clinic.

Total wastage of time :(
reply_text: Hi, Dr. Sushanth is a surgoen usually his surgeries are not planned as they will be fracture or accident cases his theater will be extended more than expected time as per the patient condition. And in such cases he might exceed the schedule time. I see in our records that you paid your consultation on 16/08/2019 Rs. 350 which is regular payment and the validity of the payment is only 7 days. Coming to next consultation on 25/08/2019 it was a second visit after a week time is chargable but since it was on sunday the consultation fee will be Rs.500/-.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: Horrible experience******** ******* ** ** *******After reaching the clinic even when doctor is available receptionist said doctor os not there and if you want him to come and check you we'll charge double the fees, that is 1000 rs.
reply_text:
Good evening Mrs. Jain,
Your appointment was booked at 1:45 pm. But Dr. Sushanth appointment schedule is from 10.00 am to 1.00 pm. and his consultation charges during those hours will be Rs.500/-.  Odd hours charges will be different, and if you remember you visited our hospital at 2.10 pm, as per our hospital records and we charged you only Rs.500/-.
Dr. Sushanth is a Ortho Surgeon and all his surgeries will be scheduled after OP hours i.e.., from 1 pm and you visited Kasturi Hospital at 2.10 pm. In-spite of his presence in OT he took your consultation if you remember....

review: Great doctor. My wrist pain that I visited him for is now gone. However, I had to wait for 1 hour 30 minutes for a 5 minute consultation. And this was after 3 patients before me in the queue left out of frustration due to the delay. I waited only because the pain was unbearable then.

tags: Wait time,
review: The doctors consultation time was very good, i had a good amount of time to explain my problem. Was been prescribed proper medication and also daily routine for the jointpains. The staff and other facilities available are also very satisfactory. Laboratory services and radiology services are also available and the reports are quite on time .

review: *** ****** *** *** **** ***** *********** Was very rude in his communication and did not listen to our concern. Was forced to pay for appointment. The amount requested on the website was completely different from what we had to pay. Clearly dissatisfied.

tags: Wait time,
review: The thing is, in the site it's mentioned that appointment on Sunday is possible from 8-9am. I booked for 10:30, upon reaching there I came to know that appointment is only between 11am-1pm. What is this? I had to travel a large distance, wasn't able to visit doctor as I had to be somewhere after 11am and also it wasted my time. At least make sure to provide right times in the website
